member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.DepthImageCompressor
member.summary: Implements a compressor used by the serialization layer for compressing streams of depth images in a generic fashion. This object should not be called directly, but instead is used by the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.DepthImageCompressor.#ctor(Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.DepthCompressionMethod)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The depth image compression method to be used.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.DepthImageFromStreamDecoder
member.summary: Implements a depth image decoder.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.DepthImageToPngStreamEncoder
member.summary: Implements a depth image encoder for PNG format.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.DepthImageToTiffStreamEncoder
member.summary: Implements a depth image encoder for TIFF format.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageCompressor
member.summary: Implements a compressor used by the serialization layer for compressing streams of images in a generic fashion. This object should not be called directly, but instead is used by the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageCompressor.#ctor(Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.CompressionMethod)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The image compression method to be used.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageFromBitmapStreamDecoder
member.summary: Implements a general bitmap image decoder.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageFromStreamDecoder
member.summary: Implements an image decoder.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageToJpegStreamEncoder
member.summary: Implements an image encoder for JPEG format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageToJpegStreamEncoder.QualityLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets JPEG image quality (0-100).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.ImageToPngStreamEncoder
member.summary: Implements an image encoder for PNG format.

member.summary: Encodes an image to a JPEG format.

JPEG quality to use.
